en.title: Upload tribunal form
en.line1: Please upload the First-tier tribunal form that you have already completed.
en.line2: If you have other evidence or supporting documents, you can upload these files on the next screen.
en.uploadRequirement:
• File formats: MS Word, PDF
  • File size per document: up to 20 megabytes (MB)
  • Files cannot be password protected

You can’t upload executable (.exe), .zip or other archive files due to virus risks.

cy.title: Upload application form - (Welsh)
cy.line1: Please upload the application form that you have already completed. - (Welsh)
cy.line2: If you are not the person name on the application, you must need to complete an additional form to ask for permission to apply on behalf of someone else. - (Welsh)
cy.uploadRequirement:
• File formats: MS Word, PDF
  • File size per document: up to 20 megabytes (MB)
  • Files cannot be password protected

You can’t upload executable (.exe), .zip or other archive files due to virus risks.

(Welsh)

en.SIZE_ERROR: File size exceeds 20Mb. Please upload a file that is less than 20Mb
en.FORMAT_ERROR: This service only accepts files in the formats - Ms Word, PDF
en.TOTAL_FILES_EXCEED_ERROR: You can upload 5 files only. Please delete one of the uploaded files and retry
en.CONTINUE_WITHOUT_UPLOAD_ERROR: You cannot continue without uploading the application
en.NO_FILE_UPLOAD_ERROR: Please choose a file to upload
